bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Juveniles in Drug Crime Prevention Act of 1993 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to increase minimum prison sentences and bar release for individuals who: (1) sell illegal drugs to persons under age 18; or (2) employ persons under age 18 in drug trafficking activities.
